function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Gathering data from multiple housing units in different states increases the risk of cross-contamination of infectious diseases.","Impact":"Cross-contamination can lead to the spread of contagious diseases across different areas, increasing the risk of outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and disinfection protocols during data collection. Use remote data collection methods where possible.","Technologies":"Remote sensing technologies, IoT devices for data collection.","People":"Researchers, data collectors, residents of housing units.","Owner":"Researchers, data collection teams, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Comparison of pre-pandemic and post-pandemic electricity use may overlook the potential impact of contagious diseases on energy consumption patterns.","Impact":"Failure to consider the impact of contagious diseases on energy use may result in inaccurate conclusions and assumptions.","Mitigation":"Include public health data and analysis of disease spread patterns in the comparison. Collaborate with public health experts.","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, epidemiological models.","People":"Researchers, public health experts.","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Drawing conclusions about changes in energy use behavior without considering the influence of contagious diseases may lead to incomplete findings.","Impact":"Incomplete findings may result in misleading recommendations for future energy use policies and practices.","Mitigation":"Integrate public health metrics and consider the role of contagious diseases in energy use behavior. Collaborate with public health researchers.","Technologies":"Data analytics, public health databases.","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health researchers.","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, public health authorities."}]}
